items.title: Ancient Greek Translation
items.description: Translate ancient texts accurately with our unique dual-mode feature. Perfect for historical research or academic work. Our advanced AI understands classical Greek grammar and syntax, ensuring faithful translations that preserve the original meaning and cultural context of ancient manuscripts, philosophical texts, and historical documents.

items.title: Transliteration Toggle
items.description: Switch Greek alphabet to Latin letters with pronunciation aids. Ideal for learning or casual reading. This feature breaks down pronunciation barriers by providing phonetic transcriptions that help learners master Greek sounds, making it easier to read signs, menus, and basic Greek text without needing to learn the Greek alphabet first.

items.title: Image-to-Text OCR
items.description: Use your camera to translate Greek signs and menus instantly. A must-have for travelers. Our advanced OCR technology recognizes handwritten and printed Greek text with remarkable accuracy, even in challenging lighting conditions or awkward angles, making navigation through Greece effortless and more enjoyable.

items.title: Voice Conversation Mode
items.description: Engage in real-time Greek ↔ English voice conversations. Enhance language learning and practice. Practice natural conversations with native-like pronunciation feedback, accent reduction tools, and real-time corrections that help you develop authentic Greek speaking skills while building confidence in everyday communication scenarios.

items.title: Diachronic Greek Translation
items.content: VibeTrans uniquely bridges the gap between Ancient Greek (Classical, Koine, Medieval) and Modern Greek. Our AI understands linguistic evolution across 3,000 years, translating philosophical texts, biblical passages, and historical documents while preserving their original cultural context and grammatical nuances that standard translators miss.
items.imageAlt: Ancient to Modern Greek linguistic evolution

items.title: Greek Script Intelligence
items.content: Advanced recognition of Greek polytonic orthography with breathings, accents, and iota subscripts. Perfect for academic work with classical texts, ensuring accurate rendering of diacritical marks essential for proper pronunciation and grammatical meaning in both scholarly and religious contexts.
